titleStmt.title: The examiner examined being a vindication of the History of liturgies / by T.C., D.D.
titleStmt.author: Comber, Thomas, 1645-1699.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to T. Comber. Cf. BM.
A reply to Samuel Bold's An Examination of Dr. Comber's Scholastical history of the primitive and general use of liturgies.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
